name: HITHER CREEK STRATEGIES, LLC OBO AANA
description: Hither Creek Strategies-a lobbying firm, AANA-Arthroscopy Association of North America
sampleDescriptions: advocate for the creation of program within DOD to train military orthopedic surgeons to perform arthroscopic surgery on military personnel injuries.
